Get parish-level deprivation data from the Church of England

Source: R/cached_imd_data.R
coe_parish_deprivation.Rd

Get parish-level deprivation data from the Church of England

Usage

coe_parish_deprivation(
  parish_codes = TRUE,
  domains = FALSE,
  subdomains = FALSE,
  supplementary = FALSE
)

Arguments

parish_codes

Character vector of parish codes to return. The default returns all parish codes.

domains

Logical. Should individual domains of deprivation be included?

subdomains

Logical. Should subdomains be included?

supplementary

Logical. Should supplementary statistics be included?

Value

A tibble of deprivation data with one row per parish.

Examples

coe_parish_deprivation()
#> ✔ Reading from coe_parish_imd_2019.
#> ✔ Range ''imd''.
#> # A tibble: 12,178 × 34
#>    parish_code parish_name             imd_score imd_rank barriers_to_housing_…¹
#>          <dbl> <chr>                       <dbl>    <dbl>                  <dbl>
#>  1      100001 Cathedral Ex. Par            15.6     6286                   17.8
#>  2      100004 St. Richard Aldwick          12.6     8321                   21.9
#>  3      100006 Angmering, Saint Marga…      12.8     8132                   25.7
#>  4      100007 Arundel with Tortington      13.4     7774                   27.9
#>  5      100009 Binsted                      18.2     4772                   47.8
#>  6      100010 Bognor                       30.7     1235                   26.3
#>  7      100011 Burpham                      19.5     4135                   53.0
#>  8      100012 Clymping                     21.6     3139                   42.8
#>  9      100014 Aldingbourne, Barnham …      12.3     8495                   23.2
#> 10      100015 East Preston Saint Mary      12.5     8383                   21.2
#> # ℹ 12,168 more rows
#> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​barriers_to_housing_and_services_score
#> # ℹ 29 more variables: barriers_to_housing_rank <dbl>, crime_score <dbl>,
#> #   crime_rank <dbl>, education_skills_and_training_score <dbl>,
#> #   education_skills_and_training_rank <dbl>,
#> #   children_and_young_people_sub_domain_score <dbl>,
#> #   children_and_young_people_rank <dbl>, …
